item.title: 特朗普逼近与加拿大、墨西哥和中国的关税对决
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备在周六发动第一波关税，这让外国政府和企业急忙避开潜在的关税，并准备报复。【原文：President Donald Trump is poised to unleash his first wave of tariffs Saturday, sending foreign governments and businesses rushing to skirt potential duties and prepare for retaliation.】

item.title: 美国调查 DeepSeek 是否通过新加坡获得英伟达芯片
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国官员正在调查中国人工智能初创公司DeepSeek是否通过新加坡的第三方购买了英伟达公司的先进半导体，从而规避了美国对用于人工智能任务的芯片销售的限制。【原文：US officials are probing whether Chinese AI startup DeepSeek bought advanced Nvidia Corp. semiconductors through third parties in Singapore, circumventing US restrictions on sales of chips used for artificial intelligence tasks, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会初步批准合并比特币和以太币 ETF
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周四批准了一项新型交易所交易基金的部分申请，该基金将追踪两种最大的加密货币。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday approved part of an application for a novel exchange-traded fund that would track the two largest cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 东京通胀创一年来最快速度，为日本央行提供支持
item.description: 在央行行长上田一夫第三次上调基准利率一周后，东京的物价增长速度加快，为央行的经济前景提供了支持。【原文：The pace of price growth in Tokyo picked up, backing the central bank’s economic outlook a week after authorities raised the benchmark rate for a third time under Governor Kazuo Ueda.】

item.title: 三星获英伟达批准开发不太先进的人工智能内存版本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三星电子公司已获准向 Nvidia 公司供应其第五代高带宽内存芯片。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. has obtained approval to supply a version of its fifth-generation high-bandwidth memory chips to Nvidia Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁震荡全球市场，原油价格上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重申计划从周六起对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税，石油价格攀升，尽管原油流可能免于征税。【原文：Oil climbed as US President Donald Trump reiterated plans to impose tariffs against Canada and Mexico from Saturday, although crude flows may be exempted from the levies.】

item.title: 调查显示，DeepSeek 几乎不会影响七大股票的走势
item.description: 本周早些时候，DeepSeek 的出现激怒了市场，但最新的彭博市场实时脉搏调查显示，投资者认为这家中国人工智能初创公司影响 "华丽七侠 "表现的空间有限。【原文：DeepSeek’s emergence roiled markets earlier this week, but investors see limited scope for the Chinese artificial intelligence startup to dent the performance of the Magnificent Seven, the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: 油气公司 Infinity Natural 首次公开募股融资 2.65 亿美元
item.description: 2013年10月31日星期四，在美国宾夕法尼亚州华盛顿镇的马塞勒斯页岩层上，EQT公司拥有的水力压裂现场堆放着螺纹钻杆。政府数据显示，自2005年以来，包括马塞勒斯页岩在内的页岩矿床产量激增了10倍，占美国天然气产量的三分之一。马塞勒斯页岩是一种天然气产量超过沙特阿拉伯的岩层，产量的增加为这个经济萧条的地区带来了发展。【原文：Threaded drilling pipes are stacked at a hydraulic fracturing site owned by EQT Corp. located atop the Marcellus shale rock formation in Washington Township, Pennsylvania, U.S., on Thursday, Oct. 31, 2013. Output from shale deposits including the Marcellus has surged 10-fold since 2005 to account for a third of the country’s gas production, government data show. The increase in production is bringing development to an economically depressed region that lies atop the Marcellus shale, a rock formation that produces more natural gas than Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz 在新一轮投资中支持 Neuralink 的竞争对手
item.description:
著名神经外科医生爱德华-张（Edward Chang）为一家脑植入初创公司筹集了约 5000 万美元。【原文：

Prominent neurosurgeon Edward Chang has raised about $50 million for a brain implant startup. 

】

item.title: 中国泡沫为何仍未破灭
item.description:
中国经济的变化预示着演变，而非崩溃。【原文：

Changes in the Chinese economy signal evolution, not collapse.

】

item.title: 华尔街走高，亚洲股市上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周五，随着苹果公司（Apple Inc）股价在盘后交易中因其季度业绩而上涨，华尔街股市的涨势延续到收盘后，亚洲股市也随之攀升。【原文：Asian equities were primed to climb Friday following gains on Wall Street that extended beyond the closing bell as Apple Inc shares rose in after-hours trading on its quarterly results.】

item.title: 韩国市场重新开市，SK 海力士股价因 DeepSeek 担忧而下滑
item.description: 在中国初创公司 DeepSeek 震惊人工智能世界的假期结束后，韩国股市周五恢复交易，Nvidia 公司的重要供应商 SK 海力士公司股价暴跌超过 11%。【原文：Shares of SK Hynix Inc., a key supplier to Nvidia Corp., tumbled more than 11% as the South Korean stock market resumed trading Friday after holidays during which Chinese startup DeepSeek shocked the AI world.】

item.title: DeepSeek 如何从大型人工智能中分一杯羹
item.description:
在这部Bloomberg Originals迷你纪录片中，我们将揭示这家中国初创公司令人震惊的创新的起因和可能后果。【原文：

In this Bloomberg Originals mini-documentary, we reveal the cause and possible consequences of the Chinese startup’s shocking innovation.

】

item.title: 你的华尔街奖金到底值多少钱
item.description:
什么时候 10 万美元不是 10 万美元？在华尔街。随着薪酬季的到来，对全球最大的 12 家银行的奖金货币进行分析，有助于揭开奖金的神秘面纱。【原文：

When is $100,000 not $100,000? On Wall Street. As compensation season takes off, an analysis of the bonus currencies for 12 of the world’s biggest banks helps demystify the awards.

】

item.title: 加密货币在特朗普讲话中得到重要启示
item.description: Teresa Xie 再次审视了特朗普第二任政府上台后加密货币社区的内讧。【原文：Teresa Xie takes another look at the infighting rippling through the crypto community at the advent of the second Trump administration.】

item.title: Adobe 高管斯科特-贝尔斯基将离职加盟 A24 电影工作室
item.description: Adobe Inc.首席战略官斯科特-贝尔斯基（Scott Belsky）将离开这家创意软件巨头，以合伙人身份加入 A24 电影工作室。【原文：Adobe Inc. Chief Strategy Officer Scott Belsky is leaving the creative software giant to join the A24 film studio as a partner.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税计划的目标是什么？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在竞选期间曾承诺立即对美国进口商品征收一系列关税，现在他重申计划从 2 月 1 日起对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的商品征收 25% 的关税。【原文：After promising during his election campaign to impose an immediate barrage of tariffs on US imports, President Donald Trump has reiterated his plans to begin with 25% levies on imports from Canada and Mexico on Feb. 1.】

item.title: 为什么明年住房成本可能会再次受到冲击？
item.description:
租金放缓不太可能持续下去。【原文：

The rent slowdown is unlikely to continue. 

】

item.title: 苹果公司报告中国市场和 iPhone 节假日销售额下降
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）报告称，在关键的假日季节，iPhone 及其中国业务的销售额出人意料地出现下滑，给这家全球最有价值公司本应表现强劲的一个季度抹上了阴影。【原文：Apple Inc. reported surprise sales declines for both the iPhone and its China business during the pivotal holiday season, marring an otherwise strong quarter for the world’s most valuable company.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言征收 25% 关税令加拿大和墨西哥货币暴跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统重申计划对来自美国两个邻国的进口商品征收 25% 的关税后，美元大幅飙升，导致加拿大和墨西哥的货币暴跌。【原文：The dollar surged, sending currencies from Canada and Mexico plunging after President Donald Trump reiterated plans to impose 25% tariffs on imports from both US neighbors.】

item.title: 蓝鳍在短暂成为第二大持有者后减持美国钢铁公司股份
item.description: 蓝鳍资本管理有限责任公司（Bluefin Capital Management LLC）本周突然成为美国钢铁公司的第二大投资者，这是这家美国钢铁制造商一年多来多事之秋的最新变化。【原文：Bluefin Capital Management LLC briefly popped up as the second-largest investor in United States Steel Corp. this week, the latest twist in an eventful year or so for the American steelmaker.】

item.title: 英特尔第四季度销售额超预期 实现扭亏为盈
item.description: 英特尔公司公布的第四季度营收好于预期，股价随之上涨，扭亏为盈的希望重燃。【原文：Intel Corp. reported better-than-feared fourth-quarter revenue, sending shares up with rekindled hopes for a turnaround.】

item.title: 声点汽车贷款公司 GLS 考虑出售价值 10 多亿美元的资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Global Lending Services 的所有者正在探讨出售这家汽车金融公司，在潜在的交易中可能会获得超过 10 亿美元的收益。【原文：The owners of Global Lending Services are exploring a sale of the auto finance company, which could fetch more than $1 billion in a potential transaction, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: HPE 首席执行官称公司将在法庭上 "积极 "捍卫瞻博网络合并案
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.首席执行官安东尼奥-内里（Antonio Neri）表示，在美国司法部起诉阻止惠普公司收购瞻博网络公司（Juniper Networks Inc.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. Chief Executive Officer Antonio Neri said his company plans to “vigorously” defend its planned acquisition of Juniper Networks Inc. in court after the US Justice Department sued to block the tie-up.】

item.title: TJC 考虑出售无线电技术提供商 Silvus 并进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，思尔沃思科技公司的私募股权所有者正在为这家移动通信提供商探索各种选择，包括出售或首次公开募股。【原文：The private equity owner of Silvus Technologies is exploring options for the mobile communications provider, including a sale or initial public offering, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 根据将养老院出售给私人股本公司的计划，老年人将面临被驱逐的命运
item.description: 坐轮椅的泰莉-盖尔伯格（Terie Gelberg）在长岛北岸的一个退休社区 Harborside 生活了近二十年。这里本应是这位有记忆问题的 99 岁老人最后的家，但将破产的设施出售给一家私人股本公司的计划可能会破坏对她的照顾。【原文：Wheelchair-bound Terie Gelberg has lived at the Harborside, a retirement community on Long Island’s North Shore, for almost two decades. It was supposed to be the last home for the 99-year-old with memory issues, but plans to sell the bankrupt facility to a private equity firm threaten to upend her care.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，OpenAI 正在洽谈价值 3400 亿美元的融资事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引不愿具名的知情人士的话报道，OpenAI 正在进行早期谈判，希望以 3400 亿美元的估值进行一轮大规模融资，这将是其 10 月份估值的两倍多。【原文：OpenAI is in early talks to raise a large funding round at a $340 billion valuation, more than doubling what it was worth in October, according to the Wall Street Journal, citing unnamed people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卢比奥称特朗普的格陵兰岛申请 "并非玩笑"，并提到了中国风险
item.description: 美国最高外交官说，唐纳德-特朗普总统购买格陵兰岛的提议 "不是一个玩笑"，因为中国有可能在岛上驻扎资源，威胁美国安全，而且北极航道对能源出口非常重要。【原文：The top US diplomat said President Donald Trump’s proposal to buy Greenland “is not a joke” because of the risk that China would station resources on the island that threaten American security and the importance of Arctic shipping lanes for energy exports.】

item.title: 五角大楼员工在被封锁前数天使用 DeepSeek 聊天机器人
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的国防部官员称，在五角大楼采取行动关闭访问权限之前，美国国防部员工将他们的工作电脑连接到中国服务器，以访问 DeepSeek 的新人工智能聊天机器人，时间至少持续了两天。【原文：US Defense Department employees connected their work computers to Chinese servers to access DeepSeek’s new AI chatbot for at least two days before the Pentagon moved to shut off access, according to a defense official familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 罗斯柴尔德聘用因拳击事件离开 Moelis 的银行家
item.description: 罗思柴尔德公司（Rothschild & Co.）正在聘用乔纳森-凯伊（Jonathan Kaye），他是纽约的一名投资银行家，去年因在布鲁克林殴打一名妇女的视频曝光而离开了 Moelis & Co.。【原文：Rothschild & Co. is hiring Jonathan Kaye, a New York-based investment banker who left Moelis & Co. last year after a video emerged of him punching a woman in Brooklyn.】
